content: Zenland Beta is Live Now!We are pleased to announce the beta release of Zenland v1.0 available at https://app.zen.land.Everyone is welcome to apply for trial funds to create Zenland contracts at no charge. Zenland is a smart contract platform that allows users to create, deploy, and execute secure and simple programmable contracts without knowing how to code. Because of its unique qualities, the Zenland contract is a secure alternative to a traditional (paper-based/digital) formal contract. All contracts are safely stored on the blockchain and can only be accessed by the parties initiating a contract.How different is Zenland?- the first smart contract platform designed with non-technical users in mind;- anonymous and secure web3 login (no personally identifiable information needed);- decentralized escrow service through blockchain smart contracts;- supports 5 major blockchain networks (+2 test networks) and their tokens;To apply as tester:1. Go to Zenland application (https://app.zen.land) and log in using MetaMask extension.2. Follow the link and fill out a simple form (no email required) https://forms.gle/ZQfV5HS5xdDL7zPG93. Wait for us to add trial funds to your internal wallet and DM you.Supported blockchain networks:Zenland contracts are written in Solidity 0.8.x, and support the majority of EVM compatible networks.Below is the list of the available main and test networks and supported tokens.- Ethereum Mainnet Â (USDT, USDC, BUSD, DAI)- Binance Smart Chain Mainnet (BUSD, USDT, USDC)- Avalanche C-chain (USDC, USDT, DAI)- Polygon Mainnet (USDT, USDC, BUSD)- Fantom Opera (USDC, DAI)- Ethereum Rinkeby Testnet (Compound USDT)- Binance Smart Chain Testnet (BUSD, USDT, DAI)Note, that the current version of the Zenland application only offers default escrow contracts. Such contracts are best suited for users buying or selling products/services online. You can learn more about blockchain escrow contracts here.We appreciate your interest in Zenland and will make sure every suggestion is given careful consideration.For more details comment on this thread, or reach out via Telegram or Discord.
